title: 203. Diamonds Are a Marriage Counselor’s Best Friend
description: It may seem like winning a valuable diamond is an unalloyed victory. It's not. It's not even clear that a diamond is so valuable.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: It may seem like winning a valuable diamond is an unalloyed victory. It's not. It's not even clear that a diamond is so valuable.
